original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, posts as p, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=7 AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:03:32' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-11 07:27:36' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 7 AND posts.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:03:32'
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 07:27:36'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E4E3.Id)
